title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Pets
body: Pets         Pets can be on trails along the Parkway, as long as they are on a leash. Image by Marc Muench.  NPS/©Muench  Pets are allowed along trails and viewpoints of the Natchez Trace Parkway under the following conditions:  Pets must always be on a leash six feet or shorter Please clean up after your pet Only service animals are allowed inside Parkway buildings.
